product_name: Aqua Sphere Vista Smoke Lens Swim Goggles
long_description: Keep the sun out of your eyes during open-water swims with the Aqua Sphere Vista Smoke Lens swim goggles. Durable polycarbonate lenses have an anti-fog and scratch-resistant coating; lenses provide 100% UVA and UVB protection. Leak-resistant silicone skirt around the lenses distributes pressure and prevents water from getting in; skirt provides extra coverage to keep cold water off your face. Tinted lenses keep the sun out of your eyes when you're training outdoors; lenses provide 180deg of visibility. Quick-Fit Buckle(TM) allows easy adjustments while you're wearing the goggles. Silicone strap endures regular use. Latex free. The Aqua Sphere Vista Smoke Lens swim goggles include a hard plastic case.
short_description: Keep the sun out of your eyes during open-water swims with the Aqua Sphere Vista Smoke Lens swim goggles.
